1.content:
It was a normal day at the Yuuki household and quiet for a while as Rito Yuuki, had been called over to help his father, a Manga creator, to aid him for the next few days and would be out of contact as it was summer vacation for them.

His little sister, Mikan, was in charge of the house til then as she had to make sure to keep up with doing the chores and help keep the house clean and more. If it was just herself it would be easier but living with them was Three princess sisters from space, Lala, Nana, and Momo. They had been living with them for a long while now and even though things do tend to change or become a bit hectic from time to time, it was never dull. Living there also was Celine, A small looking child with a large flower on her head as she wasn't any child but a plant alien as she took on the form of a small child as well.

Mikan was enjoying the peace and quiet but knew that if it was too quiet, she would expect something to happen soon as usual when things go quiet, Lala would be more then likely working on another one of her inventions.

Lala, using her inventions, had made a very large room for her and her younger sisters, Momo and Nana, in the Yuuki house by making a separate dimension for the rooms as it would be too much for any regular household.

In her room, Lala was smiling as she soon had finished working on her latest invention as she soon began to hurry out of her room with Peke, A all costume Robot that was made by Lala that can take the form of a hairpin and give different fitting clothes to the one who has her when in hairpin form. Lala soon makes it out of the room and downstairs to the living room as she notices Nana and Momo on the couch relaxing as Mikan walked up as well with Celine behind her.

"I just finished my newest and greatest invention!" Lala yelled out as she was always excited to show off all her inventions.

"What kind of invention is it this time Big sis?" Momo asked her as she was always curious about what kind of inventions Lala made knowing she could use them in anyway she could while having a little perverted fun.

Reaching behind her and holding up her hand, she held a small silver ring with a blue orb on it. it was the size of a average accessory ring but if it was made by Lala, it would be anything then average.

"I call it my Si-Si Kun! Short for Size-Size."

Mikan sighs a little as she knew she was gonna have to be the one to ask it as she soon looked over at Lala.

"Just what does it do and what is it for?" Mikan asked.

"Well, I was thinking that lately there have been a few times where we've been having trouble reaching things that are either too high up to low to even get a hand under so i decided to create a way for us to change our size's to however we want and to be able to get stuff!" Lala said with her normal innocent smile as she always did think about everyone else.

No one said anything for a moment as they looked at it. Momo had a small smile on her face knowing of the fun she could have with it while Nana covered her mouth a little wanting to keep from asking about it effect more then just the body for height and Mikan gulps a little as she was worried about what would happen with it in the wrong hands but was curious to see what she could do with it as well.

Just as Lala was getting ready to put it away, a small spark could be seen as it got everyone's attention. The ring soon grow a tiny pair of wings and soon began to fly around in the air violently.

"Big sis! What happened!?" Nana yelled out as she ducked and dodged it as the ring flew past her.

"I-I don't know!" Lala said as she panicked as well dodging the Ring.

"Lala-Sama! The Limiter on the ring has malfunctioned!" Peke said as Lala soon realized what that meant.

"What does THAT mean!?" Mikan said as she dodges the Ring and ducks down.

"It means the size's it controlled is now unlimited! There's no limits to it anymore!" Lala said still ducking down.

Without a limiter on it, there was no limit to what could happen.

"Sis! Is there anything else about it!?" Momo yelled out as she barely dodged it.

"Well, i made it so whoever wears it is injected with Nanotech to be able to breath in any situation. I didn't want to take risk's with something like that. The ring does stay on the user and goes invisible so it look's like it wouldn't even be seen." Lala said as she finished telling about the ring.

But as they let their guard down for a moment, It soon takes another fly around and the girls couldn't help but gasp at this.

Who does it hit?
1.title: Beginning!

choices: "... did something to a part of your body !"
11.content:
"Lala are you alright ?!" asked Rito

"Yeah I think, but what did just happen ?"

"Your ring flew like crazy and it made a dive toward you" explained Mikan

She rubbed the back of her head. "This ring has quite a punch in the wings." said Lala. The ring flew with such a speed that it dropped her back and knocked her out for 10 minutes. "So where did the ring go ?"

"Well, it's at your finger now. We tried to remove it, but it's both stuck and invisible !" exclaimed Nana

Lala gasped. She looked down to her right hand to look if she manages to removing the ring by herself. She tried again and again, but it was hopeless ; the ring was stuck on her finger. After letting out a big 'Sigh', she looked again down to herself. She wanted to look if there anything changed about her body. "Did my Si-Si kun do something to me ?" asked Lala worried.

At the same time Momo respond to her big sister : "Well, you see Onee-Sama, your Si-si kun ..."
11.title: Lala get hit !

15.content: It would soon fly outside and heading to a unsuspecting victim. That victim is......
15.title: Other.

155.content: Who else would be hit by it?
155.title: Other

155333.content:
The Perverted friends, Risa and Mio?

(L: )Also, this be the last choice. For now. Others may add in the ones who aren't listed yet or bring them in the other chapters. Don't want this to be too long.
155333.title: Other.

info.brief_description: When one of Lala's inventions goes out of control, again, It will change everything.
info.description:
In the To Love Ru World, Pretty much anything can happen when Lala and her inventions are involved or anything with the other girls. But how will they deal with a new invention that goes out of control and begins to allow size changing? only one way to find out of course.

So, first off, this is a Giantess interactive story so only the women can grow or shrink.

NO interaction with male characters. Also, please no one-liner chapters. please try to have them be semi-paragraphs or so.

(I did a couple one liners to keep the choices going but didn't put up too many one liners.)

What will be allowed is.....

-Growth
-Expansion. (Belly, Breasts, Butt, Etc.)
-Yuri (Girls falling in love with other Girls)
And more.

What won't be allowed is.....

-Scat (For obvious reasons.)
-Killing off characters. (mostly meaning death or just writing them off.)
-Musk. (yeah. )
-Male interaction. (This is a story for the girls and all.)

Now then, for those who don't know or don't remember the characters, here is a list to them.

Lala- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Lala_Satalin_Deviluke
Momo- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Momo_Velia_Deviluke
Nana- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Nana_Aster_Deviluke
Golden Darkness AKA Yami - http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Golden_Darkness
Yui- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Yui_Kotegawa
Mikan- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Mikan_Yuuki
Nemesis- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Nemesis
Haruna- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Haruna_Sairenji
Akiho- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Akiho_Sairenji
Mikado- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Ryoko_Mikado
Tearju AKA Tear- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Tearju_Lunatique
Mea- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Mea_Kurosaki
Oshizu- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Oshizu_Murasame
Kyouko- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Kyouko_Kirisaki
Haruko- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Haruko_Nitta
Rin- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Rin_Kujou
Saki- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Saki_Tenjouin
Run- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Run_Elsie_Jewelria
Mio- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Mio_Sawada
Risa- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Risa
Ringo- http://to-loveru.wikia.com/wiki/Ringo_Yuuki

Yeah, sorry about it being a long list and all but there are some not listed on here so you can check out the links to find others if you wish to add them.

Now then, Time for the fun to begin. ^^
